metadata.dc:author: Suárez Fernández, Guillermo
metadata.dc:description: It is our wish to review the series of 14 medical scientist or included in the Health Area of Research surrounding the Amphitheatre of the Royal National Academy of Medicine in Madrid, analyzing several circumstances to explain the absence of medical scientists like Behring, Ehrlich, Metchnikoff, Paracelso, Avicena and Wirchow, among others.
metadata.dc:title: Un friso de exaltación para las ciencias de la salud.
[A frieze of extolling for health sciences].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales de la Real Academia Nacional de Medicina
